post:
Front Range Hosting's(Now WireSix.com) Black Friday / Cyber Monday offer will be as follows.

Our two sites in Atlanta GA, and Los Angeles, CA are both route optimized with multiple 10G uplinks to our diverse set of providers.  We also have available cPanel licenses, Idera/R1Soft CDP.  cPanel Licenses are 15.00.  Requires VPS with 512MB RAM or larger.  All nodes are SSD powered, and we have added fresh nodes for this offer so new orders will be going onto new servers.   We will soon be expanding to Chicago as well no ETA though.  Deals run through next week till Friday Dec 6th.

Location info https://www.wiresix.com/locations.html

Live Chat Sales and Support available

We accept, Paypal, Credit Card, bitcoin
